Faithfull to their origins, the Daughters of Charity continue that mission of visiting prisoners and helping them to change their lives. Like Jesus, we believe that everybody deserves another opportunity so we offer not only spiritual guidance but also guidance for their reintegration into society.
Award of Honour to the Daughters of Charity for their contribution to social welfare in Madrid (SAM)

The purpose of creating this section was to gather in one place some information and to keep you up to date with the events that are important for the Company of the Daughters of Charity and/or for the whole Church. We hope that this kind of Archives will be helpful in your research.
